title: Elke Windschitl
text:
A little bit about me:
I am a master’s student studying Environmental Data Science in the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management at the University of California, Santa Barbara. I am passionate about marine and wildlife conservation, and I hope to build a career using data science tools to solve environmental problems.

---

Education


Master’s of Environmental Data Science Student


University of California Santa Barbara | Expected graduation: June 2023


Bachelor’s of Science in Biology with Honors


Iowa State University | 2020
